name: For Thy Crabs 2
description:
For Thy Crabs 2 is a remake of For Thy Crabs. I quit development of the original FTC because it was buggy, broken, unoptimized, and not very fun to play. FTC2 is basically restarting the whole game from scratch, new story, new models, new gameplay, new everything!   

 The game will release for Mac in the next update.
